sentence_zh_TW: 研究表明，過度的消費可能會導致健康問題，因此群眾應該謹慎地管理他們的飲食。
sentence: Research shows that ______ consumption can lead to health issues, thus the public should carefully manage their diets.

sentence_zh_TW: 當她看到驚人的表演時，觀眾不禁驚叫，表達了他們的激動和讚嘆。
sentence: When she witnessed the amazing performance, the audience couldn't help but ______ in their excitement and admiration.

sentence_zh_TW: 在這個研究中，研究人員必須排除那些不符合標準的參與者，以確保數據的準確性和可靠性。
sentence: In this study, researchers had to ______ participants who did not meet the criteria to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the data.

sentence_zh_TW: 有些動物因為環境變化而瀕臨絕種，而保護它們的棲息地成為當務之急。
sentence: Some animals are on the brink of ______ due to environmental changes, making habitat protection an urgent priority.

sentence_zh_TW: 她的才華讓人驚嘆，這不尋常的生涯路徑激發了許多人的靈感。
sentence: Her talent is astonishing, and this ______ career path has inspired many.

sentence_zh_TW: 設計師們精心挑選布料來創造出獨特的服裝，展現出他們的創意和風格。
sentence: Designers carefully select ______ to create unique garments that showcase their creativity and style.

sentence_zh_TW: 這個活動的極好安排使所有參加者擁有難忘的經歷，顯示出主辦方的專業素養。
sentence: The ______ arrangements for the event provided an unforgettable experience for all attendees, showcasing the professionalism of the organizers.

sentence_zh_TW: 有效的時間管理能夠促進團隊合作，並提高專案的成功率。
sentence: Effective time management can ______ teamwork and enhance the success rate of projects.

sentence_zh_TW: 頂尖學校通常擁有卓越的教職員，這是為什麼它們能吸引優秀學生的原因。
sentence: Top schools often have exceptional ______, which is why they can attract the best students.

sentence_zh_TW: 新科技的發展吸引了無數研究者和企業家的注意，推動了行業的變革。
sentence: The development of new technologies has been able to ______ countless researchers and entrepreneurs, driving change in the industry.

sentence_zh_TW: 長時間工作可能導致身體和精神的疲勞，因此適當的休息是非常重要的。
sentence: Extended work can lead to physical and mental _______, making proper rest very important.

sentence_zh_TW: 聯邦的法律架構確保了各州之間的合作，並保障公民的基本權利。
sentence: The ______ legal framework ensures cooperation among the states and guarantees the basic rights of citizens.

sentence_zh_TW: 高纖維飲食對身體的健康至關重要，有助於消化和維持正常體重。
sentence: A high ______ diet is essential for health, aiding digestion and maintaining a healthy weight.

sentence_zh_TW: 水過濾器能有效刪除雜質，提供乾淨和安全的飲用水。
sentence: Water ______ effectively removes impurities, providing clean and safe drinking water.

sentence_zh_TW: 政府在制定預算時，財政的考量是必不可少的，因為它們會影響未來的經濟政策。
sentence: When preparing a budget, ______ considerations are essential as they will impact future economic policies.

sentence_zh_TW: 海軍的艦隊在總部指揮官的指揮下執行重要任務，保護國家的安全。
sentence: The naval ______ operates under the command of the headquarters commander to carry out critical missions and protect national security.

sentence_zh_TW: 在職場中，靈活性是提升工作效率的重要因素之一，幫助員工適應多變的任務需求。
sentence: In the workplace, ______ is one of the crucial factors in enhancing productivity, helping employees adapt to shifting task demands.

sentence_zh_TW: 他用手指翻轉鈕扣，隨意調整自己的外套，顯示出優雅的風度。
sentence: He flipped the button with his fingers, casually adjusting his coat to display an air of elegance.

sentence_zh_TW: 貨運公司每天都在努力確保產品及時運送，以滿足客戶的需求。
sentence: The ______ company works diligently every day to ensure products are delivered on time to meet customer demands.

sentence_zh_TW: 許多科學探索都是在知識的邊界上進行的，不斷推動人類對宇宙的理解。
sentence: Many scientific explorations take place at the ______ of knowledge, constantly pushing humanity's understanding of the universe.
